body_html: After some tests, we found another way whose performance is close to the lock-free code. Declare a mutex array with the size equals to the indices size, then use hash to get the mutex and lock every element's update. lock is cheap and contention is expensive.

body: After some tests, we found another way whose performance is close to the lock-free code. Declare a mutex array with the size equals to the indices size, then use hash to get the mutex and lock every element's update. lock is cheap and contention is expensive.
